archimate:Capability.name: Learning Content Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to define, conceptualize, create, and convey structured content and knowledge in a consumable format that is associated with an educational curriculum, course, workshop, or seminar, delivered to achieve a level of skill or competency.

properties.value: Ability to define, conceptualize, create, and convey structured content and knowledge in a consumable format that is associated with an educational curriculum, course, workshop, or seminar, delivered to achieve a level of skill or competency.
